title: I feel like people are over reacting for these Prestige skins
body: I know it's pretty expensive to get the skin, 100-150 dollars. But understand Riot is a company. They need to make a profit too. I can't be mad about something like that when I've gotten a shit load of skins, high class skins, for free and so have you. Like let them make the skins. If people buy it thats fine. If they don't Riot will change it. Chill.
